description: Specifies a process in a recipe for use in planning from recipe.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the recipe process.

processConformsTo.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.processSpecification this recipe process conforms to.

processClassifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for the process.

hasDuration.description: The temporal extent of the process, expressed as a duration measure.

hasRecipeInput.description: References to vf.recipe.recipeFlow records that are inputs of this recipe process.

hasRecipeOutput.description: References to vf.recipe.recipeFlow records that are outputs of this recipe process.

image.description: URI to an image relevant to the recipe process.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the recipe process.
